## react-native-webshell package

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [makeFeature({ script, identifier, eventHandlerName, payloadType })](./react-native-webshell.makefeature.md) | Create a feature. |
|  [makeWebshell(WebView, assembledFeatures)](./react-native-webshell.makewebshell.md) | Creates a React component which decorates WebView component with additionnal props to handle events from the DOM. |

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [AssembledFeature](./react-native-webshell.assembledfeature.md) | A feature with its options, ready to be consumed by [makeWebshell()](./react-native-webshell.makewebshell.md)<!-- -->. |
|  [DimensionsObject](./react-native-webshell.dimensionsobject.md) |  |
|  [DimensionsOptions](./react-native-webshell.dimensionsoptions.md) | An object describing customization for the dimensions feature. |
|  [Feature](./react-native-webshell.feature.md) | A feature adds new behaviors to the <code>WebView</code> DOM and offers handlers on React Native's side. |
|  [LinkPressOptions](./react-native-webshell.linkpressoptions.md) | An object describing customization for the linkPress feature. |
|  [MakeFeatureParams](./react-native-webshell.makefeatureparams.md) | An object to specify attributes of the feature. |
|  [MinimalWebViewProps](./react-native-webshell.minimalwebviewprops.md) |  |
|  [WebjsContext](./react-native-webshell.webjscontext.md) | This type specifies the shape of the object passed to DOM features scripts. |
|  [WebshellStaticProps](./react-native-webshell.webshellstaticprops.md) |  |

## Variables

|  Variable | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [dimensionsFeature](./react-native-webshell.dimensionsfeature.md) | This feature enables receiving the full width and height of an element identified by <code>tagName</code> in the WebView pixels unit, including border widths, but excluding margins. The first element matching the provided tagName is retained. A new event will be triggered on every resize. |
|  [linkPressFeature](./react-native-webshell.linkpressfeature.md) | This feature allows to intercept clicks on anchors (<code>&lt;a&gt;</code>). By default, it will prevent the click from propagating. But you can disable this option. |

## Type Aliases

|  Type Alias | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [AssembledFeatureOf](./react-native-webshell.assembledfeatureof.md) | A lookup type to infer the assembled feature from a feature. |
|  [EventNameOf](./react-native-webshell.eventnameof.md) | A lookup type to find the event name from an assembled feature. |
|  [PayloadOf](./react-native-webshell.payloadof.md) | A lookup type to find the payload type from an assembled feature. |
|  [WebshellComponentOf](./react-native-webshell.webshellcomponentof.md) | A utility type to infer WebshellComponent type from a list of features. |
|  [WebshellComponentProps](./react-native-webshell.webshellcomponentprops.md) |  |
|  [WebshellHandlerProps](./react-native-webshell.webshellhandlerprops.md) | A smart type which infers the prop type associated with a feature. |
